item.description:
Time: 10am
Where: Packardville Rd, off Route 202 in Pelham, Mass.
Please be there on time: At 10am, if I'm the only one, I'm going to drive to Gate 5!

Difficulty: Moderate, but very long. 9 miles if we spot a car (2 or more people). If I'm hiking by myself, I'll make some other loop.

This proved too long last time, so we didn't go all the way south (we started from Gate 8). I want to get in viewing distance of the Visitor's Center. So this time we'll start at Gate 5, an hour earlier. We'll go direct to a prime viewing spot....should see very far north...about 7 miles! Then we'll take a road not on the map to Gate 8, and finally, carpool back.

Exploratory hike: I call this an "exploratory hike" with good reason. After our first foray to the shore, we'll take a road not on the map. Due to what it's near, we're pretty sure we passed both ends of this road before. I think it will take us to Packardville Rd, but I don't guarantee it! If it fades out, we'll turn back.

Important Information:

  • No wading nor pets; Quabbin is a public water supply.
  • Please remove your trash from the premises.
  • Dress in light layers; walking hills makes you warm.
  • Bring enough to drink and a lunch...this hike is long.
  • No outhouses at these gates! (Facilities on the way: Route 202...New Salem General Store; Intersection of 9/202...McDonald's)

 

Directions from Northeast and Northwest:

Take Route 122 or 2 to Route 202. Head south on 202 for about 20 minutes. Roughly 10 miles down, you'll pass a flashing yellow light at the intersection of 202 (Daniel Shays Highway) and Amherst Rd (where the Pelham Historical Society is inside an old white church on the right). Continue straight about 2.5 miles. You will see a blue sign for "Swift River Candle Company." Turn left onto Packardville Rd. Drive to the yellow gate and park in the cleared area on the side of the road.

Directions from South, West, and East:

Take Route 9 east or west to Route 202 north and continue straight about 4.5 miles. Look for a blue "Swift River Candle Company" sign and a "Caution: Low Salt Area" sign. Turn right onto Packardville Rd. Drive to the yellow gate and park in the cleared area on the side of the road.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Exploratory Hike: Quabbin Reservoir Gate 5 (Meet at Gate 8 to car-spot!)
